Class TRegion

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Polygon
org.opensourcephysics.cabrillo.tracker.TRegion
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape, Serializable
public class TRegion extends Polygon
This is a region determined by inside and outside pixel values.
Author:
Douglas Brown
